aws_db_instance_role_association.description: Manages a RDS DB Instance association with an IAM Role.

db_instance_identifier.description: DB Instance Identifier to associate with the IAM Role.

feature_name.description: Name of the feature for association. This can be found in the AWS documentation relevant to the integration or a full list is available in the `SupportedFeatureNames` list returned by [AWS CLI rds describe-db-engine-versions](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cli/latest/reference/rds/describe-db-engine-versions.html).

id.description: DB Instance Identifier and IAM Role ARN separated by a comma (`,`)
